typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SouthridgeCustomers
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SouthridgeAddresses
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> VanArsdelCustomers
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> FourthCoffeeCustomers
SouthridgeCustomers derive(SourceSystemID = toString('CloudSales'),
		SourceSystemCustomerID = CustomerID) ~> DerivedColumn1
VanArsdelCustomers derive(SourceSystemID = toString('VanArsdel'),
		SourceSystemCustomerID = CustomerID) ~> DerivedColumn4
FourthCoffeeCustomers derive(SourceSystemID = toString('FourthCoffee'),
		SourceSystemCustomerID = CustomerID) ~> DerivedColumn6
DerivedColumn1, Select1 join(SouthridgeCustomers@CustomerID == Select1@CustomerID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Select2, Select3, Select4 union(byName: true)~> Union1
SouthridgeAddresses select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID = SouthridgeCustomers@CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		SourceSystemID,
		SourceSystemCustomerID,
		CustomerID = Select1@CustomerID,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
DerivedColumn4 select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		PhoneNumber,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		SourceSystemID,
		SourceSystemCustomerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
DerivedColumn6 select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		PhoneNumber,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		SourceSystemID,
		SourceSystemCustomerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
